MACHINE_ID_NOT_FOUND: machine id is not found please check the machine id
MAC_ADDRESS_NOT_FOUND: mac address is not found please check the mac address
HASH_STRING_INVALID: hash string is invalid please check the hash string
INVALID_SUB_DOMAIN: The given company subdomain is not valid
INVALID_USER_DETAILS: For given Email address the user details is not found
INVALID_USER: The user does not exist,please regenerate the link using forgot password and try again
LINK_EXPIRED: The reset password link may be outdated or expired,please generate new link
